title: 5 of the Best Organic Vegetable Growing tips

tasks.task: Grow healthier vegetables in organic garden.
subtasks: Mulch raised beds with organic matter in autumn.
Poke holes in plastic covering for oxygen flow.
Use containers for growing vegetables in small spaces.
Assemble wooden plant boxes and hanging baskets.
Grow a flower border with herbs and flowering plants.
Attract beneficial insects to control pests.
Use mulch to suppress weeds and improve soil.
Collect and store leaves and cardboard for mulch.
Apply 2-3 inch mulch layer between plant rows.
Use black plastic mulch for squashes (if preferred).
